title: Home of the Zerg - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Fantasy   Mature   Romance   Sci-fi   Slice of Life   Smut   Supernatural   Yaoi
tags: Abandoned Children   Adopted Children   Aliens   Alternate World   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Caring Protagonist   Character Growth   Childcare   Cute Children   Cute Story   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Futuristic Setting   Heartwarming   Humanoid Protagonist   Insects   Marriage   Military   Mpreg   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Past Trauma   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Seme Protagonist   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration
author: Heng Heng   哼哼
description:
Huan Xiu transmigrated to the Zerg planet and decided to start his new life.

He happened to hear that a cub near the college had been bullied. It seemed that the reason was that the ‘female’ father of the cub was injured in the war and retreated to the rear line and now his future was hopeless. For various reasons, the cub was brutally expelled from the school.

As a sensational gossip, Huan Xiu didn’t think that the other party was the man who helped him when he first came to the world – and he was recommended to be his ‘female’ concubine under the malicious arrangement of others.>
